<noinclude>

This is the '''Csp searchbar''' template. It should be called in the following format:

<pre>
{{Csp searchbar
|mwreturn=(url) for example pass {{fullurl:Search}} to this parameter, defaults to: '{{fullurl:Special:Search}}'>
|altsearch=(term/search), default 'search', requires 'term' if using WikiSearch
|placeholder=(text) to show as placeholder in the searchbar, default: 'Search...'
|id=(id attribute of input) use different ids when displaying multiple search bars on a page, default: 'searchInput'>
|formid=(id attribute of form) use different ids when displaying multiple search bars on a page, default: 'searchform'>
}}
</pre>

Example output (WikiSearch):
<pre>{{Csp searchbar|mwreturn={{fullurl:Search}}|altsearch=term|placeholder=This takes you to 'Search'.}}</pre>
{{Csp searchbar|mwreturn={{fullurl:Search}}|altsearch=term|placeholder=This takes you to 'Search'.}}

Example output (Defaults):
<pre>{{Csp searchbar}}</pre>
{{Csp searchbar}}

Example output (Default but placeholder):
<pre>{{Csp searchbar|placeholder=Zoeken...}}</pre>
{{Csp searchbar|placeholder=Zoeken...}}

</noinclude><includeonly><form action="get" mwreturn="{{{mwreturn|{{fullurl:Special:Search}} }}}" id="{{{formid|searchform}}}">
  <div class="input-group md-form form-sm form-2 pl-0">
    <input type="text" class="form-control my-0 py-1 red-border" name="{{{altsearch|search}}}" placeholder="{{{placeholder|Search...}}}" title="Search [Alt+Shift+f]" accesskey="f" id="{{{id|searchInput}}}" tabindex="1" autocomplete="off"  type="search" aria-label="Search" /> 
    <div class="input-group-append">
      <button type="submit" class="btn btn-light text-secondary" ><i class="fas fa-search text-grey" aria-hidden="true"></i></button>
    </div>
  </div>
</form></includeonly>
